You can carry Bulk up to 5 + STR without penalty. You can't carry or hold more than 10 + STR.
The first 2 Bulk of items don't count against your Bulk limits. If you're carrying or stowing the pack rather than wearing it, its Bulk is light (L) instead of negligible (-).
